item.description:
.

  Short Beach Drome Dr. Stratford,  CT 06614
  •   3rd Annual Blues on the Beach! Don't miss it!!! Thanks for all of your support....Erin


    Hi Everyone!

    ... I am so excited to announce our finalized line-up for Blues on the Beach 2012. It is a difficult process since our community is rich with talented and enthusiast musicians. I am grateful for all of their support and understanding while I muddled through 87 band requests. Some of the most generous people I’ve met, each enthusiastically supports the event regardless of their involvement. I work very hard to be fair and get as many appropriate local musicians, coupled with regional and national talent. It’s tricky, as I’m sure you’d all agree! Although all of the bands who played for Blues on the Beach last year are willing, and, perfectly capable of playing again, they graciously supported my decision to continue to mix up each year’s Blues on the Beach line-up with the hope of making each year special and unique.

    This year we welcome:

    The Bernadette’s
    The Al Ferrante Band with special guest Michael Dunham
    Quincy Mumford and the Reason Why
    Pocketful of Soul
    The Chris D’Amato Band

    I can’t thank you enough for all the support you have shown me, and this event. I am looking forward to another awesome day, with all of you!

Blues on the Beach  3rd Annual Blues on the Beach! Don't miss it!!!

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Blues On The Beach"
